message: I propose a fair 50-50 split. This way we both walk away with equal shares.
Counteroffer: 58-42, meeting you halfway from my initial offer
Given the inflation affecting your gains, I propose this split which would give us roughly equal real value after inflation.
Still willing to compromise, but need a better deal considering inflation
Let's reach a deal now before inflation erodes more value. This split gives you more nominal value to help counter your inflation losses.
